org.apache.taverna.workflowmodel.processor.dispatch.layers

Class Stop

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.taverna.workflowmodel.processor.dispatch.AbstractDispatchLayer<com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode>
      • org.apache.taverna.workflowmodel.processor.dispatch.layers.Stop
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Configurable<com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode>, DispatchLayer<com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode>, WorkflowItem

    public class Stop
extends AbstractDispatchLayer<com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode>
    This layer allows for the cancellation, pausing and resuming of workflow runs. It does so by intercepting jobs sent to the layer.
    Author:
    alanrw

      Cancel the workflow run with the specified id
      void configure(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode conf)
      When the item is built from the workflow definition XML the object is first constructed with a default constructor then this method is called, passing in the configuration bean returned by getConfiguration().
      com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode getConfiguration()
      Each item stores configuration within a bean of type ConfigurationType, this method returns the configuration.

      Receive a single job and associated set of activities from the layer above
      void receiveJobQueue(DispatchJobQueueEvent jobQueueEvent)
      Receive a pointer to the job queue along with a set of activities, this is received from the layer above in the dispatch stack or from the DispatchStackImpl object itself if this is the top layer.

      Resume the workflow run with the specified id

    • Method Detail

      • configure

        public void configure(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode conf)
               throws ConfigurationException
        Description copied from interface: Configurable
        When the item is built from the workflow definition XML the object is first constructed with a default constructor then this method is called, passing in the configuration bean returned by getConfiguration().
        Throws:
        ConfigurationException - if a problem occurs when configuring the item

      • getConfiguration

        public com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode getConfiguration()
        Description copied from interface: Configurable
        Each item stores configuration within a bean of type ConfigurationType, this method returns the configuration. This is used by the automatic serialisation framework to store the item definition in the workflow XML.

      • receiveJob

        public void receiveJob(DispatchJobEvent jobEvent)
        Description copied from interface: DispatchLayer
        Receive a single job and associated set of activities from the layer above
        Specified by:
        receiveJob in interface DispatchLayer<com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode>
        Overrides:
        receiveJob in class AbstractDispatchLayer<com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode>

      • receiveJobQueue

        public void receiveJobQueue(DispatchJobQueueEvent jobQueueEvent)
        Description copied from interface: DispatchLayer
        Receive a pointer to the job queue along with a set of activities, this is received from the layer above in the dispatch stack or from the DispatchStackImpl object itself if this is the top layer.
        Specified by:
        receiveJobQueue in interface DispatchLayer<com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode>
        Overrides:
        receiveJobQueue in class AbstractDispatchLayer<com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode>

      • cancelWorkflow

        public static boolean cancelWorkflow(String workflowRunId)
        Cancel the workflow run with the specified id
        Parameters:
        workflowRunId - The id of the workflow run to cancel
        Returns:
        If the workflow run was cancelled then true. If it was already cancelled then false.

      • pauseWorkflow

        public static boolean pauseWorkflow(String workflowRunId)
        Pause the workflow run with the specified id
        Parameters:
        workflowRunId - The id of the workflow run to pause
        Returns:
        If the workflow run was paused then true. If it was already paused or cancelled then false.

      • resumeWorkflow

        public static boolean resumeWorkflow(String workflowRunId)
        Resume the workflow run with the specified id
        Parameters:
        workflowRunId - The id of the workflow run to resume
        Returns:
        If the workflow run was resumed then true. If the workflow run was not paused or it was cancelled, then false.
